profile:
A Glass Act has been providing window cleaning, Gutter cleaning, Gutter repairs, interior Painting, exterior Painting, drywall repairs, chandelier cleaning, pressure washing, power washing, house washing, building cleaning exterior, roof cleaning, roof de-mossing, roof moss control treatments, concrete & Paving stone sealing, post construction cleaning, pre-occupany cleaning and a variety of other building maintenance services in the Vancouver area since 1988. 

****

We are pleased to announce that effective July 1, 2015, all of our cleaning services are now available to residents and business' in the Victoria & the Saanich Peninsula area! 

****

COVID-19 STATEMENT

COVID-19 has been declared a pandemic. Federal, provincial and local governments and their agencies have been announcing daily recommendations and restrictions that affect the everyday lives of every Canadian.

Whereas the health authorities are still stating that the risk of contracting the virus is low to moderate in BC, the health and safety of our staff and customers is a paramount concern for us at A Glass Act Window Cleaners & Building Maintenance.

We would ask that customers postpone in booking any INTERIOR CLEANING appointments with us until such time that the major Canadian health authorities announce that it will be safer for us to be working indoors (in your homes) in a more contained proximity to our customers.  We will continue to provide our EXTERIOR CLEANING services at this time while following the very important social distancing regulations.

In addition, we are requiring our staff to self-isolate if they become ill or if someone in their household becomes ill.  We do look forward to providing you with our exterior Spring cleaning service, to get your home or business looking refreshed and clean for the season.  We know that many of you will be spending more time in your yards, gardens and patios this Spring while staying at home.  We look forward to making your building exteriors cleaner and brighter while we all stay safer and healthy at home!!

Thank you for your understanding and support.

Kirby Koochin
(President)
A Glass Act Window Cleaners and Building Maintenance Ltd.

profile:
PROCLEAN was started after recognizing a need for an affordable but professional cleaning. We have built our company reputation on providing service that is a cut above the others for prices you could afford.

To insure our credibility and trustworthiness we are licensed and properly insured. In addition all of our staff members are employees, not contractors or sub contractors.

All our employees are covered under BC Worksafe. If a contractor gets hurt in your home or on your property you are potentially liable if they do not have insurance.

Our cleaning specialists are professionally trained cleaning experts. They are trained to complete cleaning assignments on time and exceed customer expectations. Our services are affordable and our pricing is tailored to meet your budget. ProClean continues to be a great value for our residential housecleaning clients and small business clients.

profile:
Why Choose Us
Vancouver is a great city to explore and experience. Imagine coming home to a freshly made bed, sparkling clean kitchen and bathroom, and meticulously swept and mopped floors. Our Parsu Clean Specialists are happy to do the hard work. However you like to spend your time, you’ll enjoy coming home to a squeaky clean environment.
GONE GREEN?
Let us know if you prefer green cleaning supplies.
TRUST US
Our team members undergo strict background checks and are thoroughly screened.
TRUSTED TEAM
Steady rains the leaves are dropping and each week our and hauling them off the properties..
YOUR SATISFACTION IS GUARANTEED
If you aren’t satisfied, we’ll re-clean for free.
SECURE PAYMENT
Once the cleaning is complete, your payment is made securely online.
IT'S THAT EASY
Select the number of bedrooms, pick your date & time, and Parsu Cleaning will be there for you!

profile:
The type and manner of cleaning needed is different for every client, so the first step in our quality control program is to listen and observe. You know your industry, your workplace and your customers, so hearing what you have to say about your cleaning needs is really important to us. And, we’ll have those conversations more than once.

We check in with our clients on a regular basis and we’ll also ask that you call us if you have any concerns about the services you’ve received. We’ll also call you if we notice anything that requires your attention or if we can recommend some improvements. Close communication with our clients is one of the hallmarks of our success!
